query: dialog with R's persona: persona: my grandfather served in world war a. i'm in the army. i did not graduate high school. i live in canada. context:  Q: hello how are you today ? R: <extra_id_0>
answers: not much , just came back from iraq . you ?
generation: i am doing well. how are you?

passages.title: Overweight Kid
passages.text: My parents were overweight. I was overweight as well. The doctors told my parents it was unhealthy. My parents understood and decided to make a change. They got themselves and I on a diet.

passages.title: Foolish Frank
passages.text: I had been drinking beer. I got a call from my girlfriend, asking where I was. I suddenly realized I had a date that night. Since I was already a bit drunk, I could not drive. I spent the rest of the night drinking more beers.

passages.title: Samantha is Self-Sufficient
passages.text: My dad always taught me how to be self-sufficient. I even taught myself how to change a tyre on a car. One day my tyre blew while I was driving. I was able to properly change my tyre. I was very grateful to be able to get home safely.

passages.title: Abel's work
passages.text: I worked hard mowing lawns for extra money. I currently had 5 lawns I was responsible for. One day one of my customers was unhappy with the work I did. I apologized and promised to do a better job next time. The customer did not want Able to continue to work on my lawn.

passages.title: Drunk Driving
passages.text: I got drunk at the Christmas party. I decided to drive home under the influence of alcohol. Sure enough, I was stopped by the police. The police arrested me and sent me to jail. I had to pay a fine and realize I should not drink and drive.

passages.title: Flat Tire
passages.text: I was driving to work one day. All of a sudden, I heard my tire pop. When I pulled over, I found that I had a flat tire. I had to call AAA to get my tire fixed. Unfortunately, I ended up being late for work.
